body_html:
This is being fixed here: grpc/grpc#8975.
I made an integration with the temp fix: https://github.com/llhe/tensorflow/tree/grpc-fix.

The issue with grpc polling buffer is resolved:
device1-prof-grpc-fix.pdf

The current remaining unnecessary memory copy is a known issue marked as TODO by Jeff and Sanjay: tensor raw content decoding which actually buffer memcpy.
body_text:
This is being fixed here: grpc/grpc#8975.
I made an integration with the temp fix: https://github.com/llhe/tensorflow/tree/grpc-fix.
The issue with grpc polling buffer is resolved:
device1-prof-grpc-fix.pdf
The current remaining unnecessary memory copy is a known issue marked as TODO by Jeff and Sanjay: tensor raw content decoding which actually buffer memcpy.
body:
This is being fixed here: https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/8975.
I made an integration with the temp fix: https://github.com/llhe/tensorflow/tree/grpc-fix. 

The issue with grpc polling buffer is resolved:
[device1-prof-grpc-fix.pdf](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/653818/device1-prof-grpc-fix.pdf)

The current remaining unnecessary memory copy is a known issue marked as TODO by Jeff and Sanjay: [tensor raw content decoding](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/tensor_coding.cc#L199) which actually [buffer memcpy](https://github.com/google/protobuf/blob/master/src/google/protobuf/io/coded_stream_inl.h#L70).
